message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping to get a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12000?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13500. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $13000?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13250. This is my final offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12800?

I've already made a few concessions, and I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000. This is a firm price, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
